page.description: Returns a string + the case information.
page.discussion: CASE_PRESERVE() returns the original Input_String with an appended hexadecimal code that indicates which characters of the Input_String are upper case. The appended code has sufficient bits to represent each character of the Input_String as 1 (upper case) or 0 (lower case). The most significant bit is to the left. The following illustration shows how the algorithm works. Note : CASE_PRESERVE() allows you to distinguish between upper and lower case versions of strings when using functions that are not case sensitive.
